message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.NI

This paper discusses security vulnerabilities in Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) devices and proposes mitigation strategies. The primary focus is on the security of Android applications that access sensitive data on BLE devices, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also involves a large-scale analysis of BLE-enabled Android applications, which could fall under information retrieval (cs.IR) or software engineering (cs.SE). The use of BLE technology in IoT devices and the potential risks to user privacy and safety could also fall under systems and control (cs.SY) or networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
